channel.title: HKG:1777 on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in HKG:1777 on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Chinese Builder Fantasia Plans to Unveil New Restructuring Plan
item.description: Chinese developer Fantasia Holdings Group Co. plans to release a new restructuring plan in the coming weeks after previous attempts fizzled, people familiar with the matter said, underscoring the year
